author: INEMA
text:
Claro! Para gerar o **modelo de e-mail frio (cold email)** personalizado e pronto para envio, por favor preencha os seguintes campos:

- **[Topic]**: Assunto do e-mail  
- **[ProspectName]**: Nome do prospect  
- **[CompanyName]**: Nome da empresa do prospect  
- **[Industry/Field]**: Setor de atuação da empresa  
- **[ProductServiceBenefits]**: Benefícios principais do seu produto ou serviço  
- **[CallToAction]**: Próximo passo sugerido (ex: marcar uma call, responder o e-mail, testar a ferramenta)  
- **[YourName]**: Seu nome (quem está enviando)

Assim que você me passar essas informações, eu gero o e-mail completo com tom profissional, envolvente e objetivo, dentro do limite de 150–200 palavras.

author: INEMA
text:
```Instructions:
1. Using the provided variables, generate a tailored cold outreach email addressing the prospect.
2. Begin with a friendly greeting and personalized introduction using [ProspectName] and [CompanyName].
3. Clearly explain the [ProductServiceBenefits] and how it addresses specific pain points or needs of the prospect.
4. Conclude with a strong and concise [CallToAction] that guides the prospect on the next step.
5. Ensure the email tone is professional, engaging, and concise.
6. Output the final email in plain text.

Constraints:
- Use the variables exactly as provided. Do not modify the placeholders.
- Keep the email concise (around 150-200 words maximum).
- Maintain a clear structure: Greeting, introduction, main content, call-to-action, and a friendly sign-off.
- Ensure any background context related to the prospect or service is naturally integrated into the email.

Example Structure:
---
Subject: [Topic]

Hi [ProspectName],

I hope you're well. I came across [CompanyName], and I was impressed by your work within [Industry/Field]. I wanted to introduce you to our solution that offers [ProductServiceBenefits]. I believe our approach can significantly enhance your current process, helping you achieve better results.

Could we schedule a brief call to discuss how our service aligns with your objectives? [CallToAction]

Looking forward to your thoughts.

Best regards,
[YourName]
---
